item.title: Install all firmware updates on Dell PowerEdge servers with Ansible
item.description: This feature is only available with iDRAC Enterprise License. The supported servers are : 12G and 13G PowerEdge Servers: iDRAC 7 and 8 with Firmware version 2.50.50.50 and above 14G PowerEdge Servers: iDRAC 9 with Firmware version 3.18.18.18 and above While looking once more for the most easy way to update Dell servers firmwares, I stepped on this awesome video showing someone from Dell use Ansible to update at once all the firmwares of a server :
